name: Defenders of Suntoria: Dark Sun Rising (Canceled)
blurb: Fantasy Tower Defense game with RPG elements developed for iOS, Android and PC

rewards.reward: BELIEVER \u2013 Thank You! For your support you get one downloadable digital copy of the game. Plus you will get \u201cDefender\u201d status on our forum with access to exclusive sections to discuss the game and share ideas with developers.

CLERIC APPRENTICE \u2013 You get downloadable digital copy of the game plus \u201cDefender\u201d status on our forum with access to exclusive section and a unique link to downloadable soundtrack of the game.

CLERIC ACOLYTE \u2013 Digital Copy+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers. Special Thanks! Your name will be mentioned in game credits. You also get pdf with game art and set of unique wallpapers.

CLERIC ADEPT \u2013 Digital Copy+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit. You get a Bonus Starter Kit \u2013 a set of consumables at the very beginning of the game to refresh your Hero during hot battles.

WARPRIEST \u2013 Digital Copy+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set. You get a unique special achievement in Game Center that unlocks several items in the game shop, and won\u2019t be available for the others. You also get a Bonus Jewelry Set consisting of two trinkets \u2013 ring and necklace \u2013 giving your hero a unique bonus.

ZEALOT \u2013 Digital Copy+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+We Follow You. @DoSuntoria and Steel Steed Studio will start following you on Twitter and Facebook. Jump at the chance for your words to be spread by us within the communities.

BLESSED BY SUNTOR \u2013 2 Digital Copies+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+We Follow You+Advanced Item Set. You get exclusive Advanced Weapon and Armor Set for your Hero. And additional digital copy of the game for your friend or relative to join ultimate battles.

DEMON HUNTER \u2013 2 Digital Copies+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+We Follow You+Advanced Item Set+Beta Acess. You receive a key to closed Beta version of the game to test it with us and hunt down pesky demons (read: bugs)

HOLY WARRIOR \u2013 3 Digital Copies+Forum Status+Downloadable OST+In-game Credits+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+We Follow You+Advanced Item Set+Beta Acess+Memorial Stone. You become a historical figure in the world of Suntoria and your name is carved on a memorial stone situated at one of the most important locations. You also receive another digital copy of the game.

MORNING LORD \u2013 5 Digital Copies+Forum Access+Downloadable OST+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+Advanced Item Set+We Follow You+Beta Acess+Memorial Stone+Design an item+Golden Thanks+Golden Status at Forum. You name and design a unique in-game item, armor or weapon. In addition you get special Golden Thanks in credits and receive a Golden VIP \u201cArchon\u201d status at forum with ability to moderate the forum and clear it from evil creatures! And get 5 digital copies of the game instead of 3

DIVINE \u2013 5 Digital Copies+Forum Access+Downloadable OST+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+We Follow You+Advanced Item Set +Beta Acess+Memorial Stone+Design an item+Golden Thanks+Golden Status at Forum+Hero\u2019s Custom Portrait. Customized face of a Hero in interface (textures) that is possible to choose at the beginning of the game is made after Backers photo. Important: this reward is limited to 10.

SUNTOR\u2019S AVATAR \u2013 5 Digital Copies+Forum Access+Downloadable OST+PDF Artbook+Wallpapers+Bonus Kit+Game Center Achievement+Jewelry Set+We Follow You+Advanced Item Set+Beta Acess+Memorial Stone+Design an item+Golden Thanks+Golden Status at Forum+Hero\u2019s Custom Portrait+Become a part of the Story+Regular Skype Meetings. You get a role in the plot - one of the main NPC looks like you. You also become a member co-director and help us improve the game during discussions and give us new and fresh ideas via Skype at regular meetings once in two weeks. Important: Suntor can't have more than 3 avatars.
